name: Obut Pétanque 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French. Point, shoot... play! Enjoy the fun and tactics of pétanque in this game made in cooperation with the prestigious boules brand OBUT®.   - Have fun with up to 4 friends in Local Multiplayer!  - 8 arenas around the world and 4 different types of ground.  - Choose the members of your team depending on their abilities.  - From Training to Championship, progress through Career mode and become the best!
